group_1.textLeft: Oh, Umika Misaki is... She's, well...
She's a... *Sob* B-best-selling... *Sniff*
Novelist!!! Waaaaaaaaah!

group_1.textRight: [chara:401101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa! Wh-what's the matter? What's she@crying for?!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm....
Oh, I know why!
I knew it! This is a Sobbing Shroom.
Did you eat this, Kanoko?
They're another kind of mushroom that@grows in Kamihama.

Eating them puts you into a crying fit...[chara:302001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302001:cheek_0][chara:302001:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:302001:lipSynch_1]@Oh, but they aren't poisonous, at least.
I thought I told you not to eat those ones!
Y-yes, but once you told me...I...I got@curious...waaaaaah!

group_1.narration: Kanoko just couldn't resist the effects of@the mushroom.
But she managed to tell me something@through all the sobbing!
She knew a good place for me to get @advice about my missing memories!
It seems like it's a popular place in@Kamihama to get free counseling.
But we didn't want to just leave@Kanoko crying by herself.@So Himika decided to stay with her.
...And I headed to the@counseling room alone.

group_1.textCenter: (Whew! I wonder what this "Emily" girl@is like...)
(I might not have my memories, but I still@want to survive...)
(Yes, this is the place... Here I go!)

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hey there! Come right on in!
Emily? Oooh, let's see here.@Emily...Emily...
...Wait! [chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]That's, like, me! You're looking at@her!
[chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes! The one and only!
What's your name?
Kazumi the Amnesiac!@[chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]Okay, let's see. Kazumi...Kazumi...
Simple is best, am I right?[chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1] So let's go with@"Kazumin"!
Absolutely! It's totally great to meetcha@Kazumin!

group_1.textRight: Ah, um, I...I'm happy to meet you too!

group_1.textLeft: So! What's up?
Oh yeah, you said that! Sorries!
[chara:300601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]But wait, seriously? That's crazy!
I've never heard of something like that!@Like, real amnesia? Wow!

group_1.textRight: What do you think I should do?
I really can't remember anything except...@Well, just my name.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Oooh, I know just what to do@about something like this...
First we gotta search through your things![chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]@I saw it on a TV show!

group_1.textRight: Ohhh, I forgot to check my stuff! [chara:401101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:401101:cheek_0][chara:401101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:401101:lipSynch_1]Maybe@there's something useful in here...
Found something! ...A flyer? Where did@I get this?

group_1.textLeft: Lemme see, lemme see!
"Cafe Lepa Machka, opening soon"?
Where's this?[chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1] Oh, it says Asunaro City!

group_1.textRight: Asunaro? Is that far from here?

group_1.textLeft: I dunno. You could probably like go there@for a day trip from here I think?
Oooh, so this has gotta mean you're an@Asunaro girl, right?
Cafe Lepa Machka in Asunaro City...
[chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Oh ho! This means we've got some clues to@work with!
Oooh, this is amazing! I feel like we're in @a TV show or something.
I'm gonna ask my friends! Good idea, [chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]yeah?
[chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Tee hee!
Mm, but...which one should I bug about@this? Hmm...
Whoa, Sasaran! [chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]You read my mind!@Perfect timing!
Say what?
